sentences: Ta ütles mulle, et ta on õnnelik.
Sa ei saa seda öelda kellelegi!
context: The Estonian word 'ütles' is the past tense of the verb 'ütlema', meaning 'to say'. It’s commonly used to report what someone has said, similar to the English words ‘said’, ‘stated’, or ‘told’. It indicates a completed action of speaking.
